thread.title: First Teaser for 'Daredevil' Season 2 Officially Released
thread.title_full: First Teaser for 'Daredevil' Season 2 Officially Released

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: First Teaser for 'Daredevil' Season 2 Officially Released
text:
Comments The newly released video gives a clearer look at Elektra (Elodie Yung) wearing a fabric mask and The Punisher (Jon Bernthal) walking down a hospital corridor. 
Following its debut at New York Comic Con over the weekend, the first teaser for " Daredevil " season 2 is now officially released online. While its content was previously revealed via the bootleg video , the official one gives a clearer look at Elodie Yung's Elektra. In the video, Elekra is seen pulling a fabric mask across the lower half of her face. It also offers a glimpse of Jon Bernthal 's The Punisher from the back as he walks down a hospital corridor. Meanwhile, Karen Page ( Deborah Ann Woll ) is featured looking at an x-ray of a skull and Claire Temple ( Rosario Dawson ) is wearing a hospital garb. There's also a shot of the Man Without Fear himself ( Charlie Cox ) and his friends, Karen and Foggy Nelson (Elden Henson), looking somber in a church. "Why do I still feel guilty?" Matt says. Season 1 was awesome.Watch the @Daredevil #NYCC sizzle... Season 2 looks epic! http://t.co/Ce7EJjhZkT https://t.co/Ak03ebZIJq — App Store (@AppStore) October 12, 2015 At the NYCC, new co-showrunner Marco Ramirez promised a darker season 2. "You wanted grounded, you wanted dark, here's Elektra, here's Punisher," he said with a laugh. Co-showrunner Doug Petrie added, "Last year, Steven [DeKnight] and Drew [Goddard] did a great job of introducing that world... This year, we get to test that world, take it further, [make it] darker, more emotional." Slated to arrive in 2016, the second season of the Netflix/Marvel series added Stephen Rider as a series regular. He will play Blake Tower, a District Attorney for New York City who will help Matt Murdock with information to help track down and capture criminals.
